name: Thundering Penance
title: Keqing: Thundering Penance
desc: As long as you're not actually cheating, this is just the name of a card.

source: Reward for inviting Keqing to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1403], equip this card.
After $[A1403] equips this card, immediately use $[S14032] once.
When your $[A1403], who has this card equipped, creates an Electro Elemental Infusion, it will have the following effects:
Starting Duration (Rounds) +1, Electro DMG dealt by the attached character +1.
(You must have $[A1403] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
